name: An Undertaking Conundrum
description:
Players advance through an action game by completing a series of levels. Levels are often grouped by theme, with similar graphics and enemies called a world.  the player controls a single avatar as the protagonist. The avatar has the ability to navigate and maneuver, and often collects or manipulates objects  the avatar has a certain number of hit-markers or health, which are depleted by enemy attacks and other hazards. Sometimes health can be replenished by collecting an in-game object. When the player runs out of health, the player dies.                                                                                                                                                                                                                   DEVELOPER              -       SHYAM JI                                                                                                                                                                        AWASTHI

                                                                                                                    ADVISER             -             KRITIKA                                                                                                                                                                          AWASTHI
